thread.title_full: 22-member cast for Sideshow's 'Truth and Reconciliation' - Chicago Tribune

author: Morgan Greene
title: 22-member cast for Sideshow's 'Truth and Reconciliation' - Chicago Tribune
text:
22-member cast for Sideshow's 'Truth and Reconciliation' The cast of 'truth and reconciliation' Morgan Greene Chicago Tribune 
Sideshow Theatre Company announced the 22-member cast of Debbie Tucker Green's "Truth and Reconciliation" Wednesday. 
The production will feature E'Mon Lauren Black, Latrel Crawford, Ashley Crowe, Travis Delgado, Sam Guinan-Nyhart, David Lawrence Hamilton, Kayla Raelle Holder, Michael Holding, Ann James, Tiffany Renee Johnson, Ian Martin, Jennifer Mathews, Eamonn McDonagh, Monette McLin, Carolyn Nelson, Tiffany Oglesby, Jeremy Pfaff, Bradford Stevens, Keith Surney, Isabel Thompson, Netta Walker and Sean Wiberg. 
Sideshow artistic director Jonathan L. Green will helm the 60-minute epic spanning five global conflicts and 30 years. 
"Truth and Reconciliation" runs March 12 to April 16 at the Victory Gardens Richard Christiansen Theater, 2433 N. Lincoln Ave.
